FILTER_MODE (ENUM)
FILTER_MODE (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE FILTER_MODE :
Filter settings for the subcriber function block.
Attributes:
qualified_only
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
FILTER_ON
0
Filters the telegrams by topics
FILTER_OFF
1
Turns the filter off and receives ALL subscribed telegrams
FILTER_NONE
2
Receives no telegrams. In this mode you can only subscribe
or unsubscribe topics

rows.Name: FILTER_OFF
rows.Comment: Turns the filter off and receives ALL subscribed telegrams

rows.Name: FILTER_NONE
rows.Comment:
Receives no telegrams. In this mode you can only subscribe
or unsubscribe topics
